credit_consulting.name: Beginner's Package
credit_consulting.description: Refer a friend and get $25 off your credit repair, and your friend only pays $75!
list: Access to list of potential credit cards you can get approved for
Coaching on how to maintain and build credit
Money back with every referral (Get $25 back for everyone that signs up and uses your name as a referral)

credit_consulting.name: Package 2
credit_consulting.description: Refer a friend and get $50 off your credit repair, and your friend only pays $75!
credit_consulting.rate: Flat rate member fee + item removal fees
list: Removal of derogatory remarks on your credit report ($25-$50 per item depending on what you want removed)
Access to list of potential credit cards you can get approved for
Coaching on how to maintain and build credit
Money back with every referral (Get $25 back for everyone that signs up and uses your name as a referral)
